channel.title: Posts on WHW blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on WHW blog

item.title: Preparation of GCP ACE Certification (2020)
item.description: Go to this article for the note of the Coursera course Cloud Engineering with GCP After sailing through the storm with my company (thank you COVID-19 😵), I decided to have a two-week off studying GCP ACE exam on my own and leave all the things behind. I’ve passed the exam in late June of 2020 and got the certification. This article records how I prepare for the exam and those awesome reading materials I’ve found.

item.title: Course Note: Cloud Engineering with GCP on Coursera
item.description: This is the note of the course Cloud Engineering with GCP. Go to this article to see how I prepared for GCP ACE exam. Mind Map GCP Network Resources VPC Network Subnet IP Load Balancer HTTP(S) SSL Proxy TCP Proxy Regional Multi-Regional VPN & Peering & Interconnect Compute Services Compute Engine (GCE) Disk type persistent HDD/SSD Local SSD Instance template Instance group App Engine (GAE) Standard Flexible Kubernetes Engine (GKE) Cloud Function Storage Data warehouse BigQuery Database NoSQL BigTable Cloud Firestore Datastore mode Native mode Relational Cloud SQL Cloud Spanner Redis/Memcache Cloud Memorystore SDK gcloud gsutil bq Stackdriver Monitoring Logging Debug Error reporting Trace Big data services BigQuery Cloud Dataproc Cloud Dataflow Cloud Pub/Sub Cloud Datalab SDK Cloud SDK installation and quick start gcloud tool guide gcloud command gsutil command bq command Resource Management Resource Hierarchy Global Images Snapshots Networks Regional External IP addr.

item.title: Use Hugo for the first time
item.description: Shortcodes Hugo native shortcodes Embed Google Presentation figure & gallery Enable MathJax Add following lines into theme/<theme>/layout/partials/math.html <script src="//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/mathjax/2.7.0/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS-MML_HTMLorMML" type="text/javascript" ></script> <script type="text/x-mathjax-config"> MathJax.Hub.Config({ tex2jax: {inlineMath: [['$','$']]} }); </script> and put following lines in any template that the target page used: {{ if or .Params.math .Site.Params.math }} {{ partial "math.html" . }} {{ end }} and then put the parameter math: true on the target page to enable MathJax.

[Paper] Neural Style Transfer
item.description: 1. What’s Neural Style Transfer? 大家對 Style Transfer 這個詞可能很陌生，但應該很多人記得 2016 年在 Apple Store 和 Google Play 兩大平台皆奪下年度 App 的Prisma，將照片轉換成畫作的功能大受歡迎，或

item.title: MTIMESX: MATLAB快速多維矩陣乘積
item.description: 在多維矩陣運算當中，雖然用多個 for-loops 處理較為直觀易懂，但其實非常耗時。在我修習台大醫工所的人體動做分析電腦計算方法時，發現了 MATLAB 有MTIMESX這

item.title: 吳恩達 Deep Learning Specialization -- 課程介紹與心得
item.description: All photos credit to deeplearning.ai 1. 修課背景 我自己是機械背景，在機械所碩士班一年級期間修習了台大資工林軒田教授開設的機器學習基石和機器學習技法兩門課 (也是從那個時候

item.title: Student Projects
item.description: Human Motion Analysis Programming MATLAB programs for human motion analysis, including motion tracking, evaluation of body balance, and derivation of joint forces and torques of the lower body, etc. It uses the data derived from a motion capture system and force plates. [GitHub] Web Crawler of USPTO PatFT Database Web crawler with PyQt5 UI for automatically gathering information of issued US patents and batch download in the format of PDF.
